channel.title: Newbie Image Question
channel.description:
Is there an image format that is indexed to 256 colors yet has an alpha channel?
Forgive the stupidness.

item.title: Newbie Image Question
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“jediz, post:4, topic:549036”][quote author=Limits link=topic=667944.msg4467093#msg4467093 date=1420729341]

The only thing I found PNG-8 http://www.8bitalpha.com/
Is there any particular reason that you need this? Because not every software support all image formats.

I was thinking about using that format for textures. Because i need an alpha channel and indexed colors take less space
[/quote]

How come the format Jagex uses for textures is not good enough for your taste?[/quote]
It’s not for RSPS.

Read full topic
